Class Robot

java.lang.Object
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.model.Component
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.model.Robot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Figure, Visitable, Serializable
public class Robot extends Component
Represents a robot in the robot simulation. A robot can move, visit components, and manage its battery level. The robot's behavior includes moving to specified Visitable components, charging at ChargingStations, and interacting with the Factory.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Robot

      public Robot(String name, int x, int y, int width, int height, int speed, int capacity, Style style, Factory factory, boolean hasPathFinder)
      Constructs a Robot with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the robot.
      x - X-coordinate of the robot's position.
      y - Y-coordinate of the robot's position.
      width - The width of the robot.
      height - The height of the robot.
      speed - Speed of the robot.
      capacity - The battery capacity of the robot.
      style - The Style of the robot.
      factory - The Factory to which the robot belongs.
      pathFinder - The FactoryPathFinder that will helps the robot's movements.

    • Robot

      public Robot(String name, int x, int y, int width, int height, int speed, int capacity, Factory factory, boolean hasPathFinder)
      Constructs a Robot with default style. Delegates to the main constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the robot.
      x - X-coordinate of the robot's position.
      y - Y-coordinate of the robot's position.
      width - The width of the robot.
      height - The height of the robot.
      speed - Speed of the robot.
      capacity - The battery capacity of the robot.
      factory - The Factory to which the robot belongs.
      hasPathFinder - Whether the robot uses a path finder.

    • Robot

      public Robot(String name, int x, int y, int speed, int capacity, Factory factory, boolean hasPathFinder)
      Constructs a Robot with default size and specified speed and capacity. Delegates to the main constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the robot.
      x - X-coordinate of the robot's position.
      y - Y-coordinate of the robot's position.
      speed - Speed of the robot.
      capacity - The battery capacity of the robot.
      factory - The Factory to which the robot belongs.
      hasPathFinder - Whether the robot uses a path finder.

    • Robot

      public Robot(String name, int x, int y, int speed, Factory factory, boolean hasPathFinder)
      Constructs a Robot with default size and capacity, and specified speed. Delegates to the main constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the robot.
      x - X-coordinate of the robot's position.
      y - Y-coordinate of the robot's position.
      speed - Speed of the robot.
      factory - The Factory to which the robot belongs.
      hasPathFinder - Whether the robot uses a path finder.

    • Robot

      public Robot(String name, int x, int y, Factory factory, boolean hasPathFinder)

      y - Y-coordinate of the robot's position.
